DOC.brief_summary: Patients HIV virologically suppress lopinavir/ritonavir combination highly active antiretroviral therapy ( HAART ) regimen elevate non-HDL cholesterol randomize remain lopinavir/ritonavir change atazanavir/ritonavir combination current nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( NRTIs ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study HIV Patients With Undetectable Viral Load Abnormal Lipids Switching Atazanavir/Ritonavir
DOC.criteria: HIV positive LPV/RTVbased HAART least 6 month HIV1 RNA le 50c/mL ( confirm ) NonHDL high 160 mg/dL CD4 least 50 cells/mL Use lipidlowering agent
